visibility.description: By choosing your account visibility you control who sees what. ‘Publish your profile’ means that others can visit your profile URL (this is your unique internet address). Make sure both ‘Publish your profile’ and the ‘Connect with me’ setting has the status ‘On’ so others can request to connect with you. ‘Visible for search’ means others can find you in the Society.

public_profile.description: Allows others to view your profile.
public_profile.recommended_action: Enable to let others find you.
actions: Disable to make your profile not viewable.

connect_with_me.description: Allows others to send you connection requests.
connect_with_me.recommended_action: Enable to let others connect with you.

visible_for_search.description: Controls whether your profile shows up in search results.
visible_for_search.recommended_action: Enable to let others find you.
actions: Enable to show up in search results.
Disable to not show up in search results.

who_can_find_you.description: Controls who can find your profile.
who_can_find_you.recommended_action: Set to 'Logged on only' to only allow platform users to find you.
actions: Set to 'Everyone' to let everyone find you.
Set to 'Logged on only' to only allow platform users to find you.

system_notifications.description: Manage your notifications and preferences and determine your iYYU updates.

system_critical.description: Receive important notifications such as reset password and authentication emails.
actions: Disable to not receive such notifications.

news.description: Receive updates when new features are released on iyyu.com.
actions: Disable to not receive such notifications.

updates.description: Receive notifications when there is news to share.
updates.recommended_action: Enable to receive important update notifications.
actions: Disable to not receive such notifications.

receive_notification_for_connecting.description: Receive an email notification when someone wants to connect with you.
actions: Disable to not receive email notifications.

receive_notification_for_request_update.description: Receive an email notification when someone accepts or declines your request to connect with them.
actions: Disable to not receive email notifications.

receive_notification_when_someone_start_.description: Receive an email notification when someone starts following your notes.
actions: Disable to not receive email notifications.

receive_notification_for_messages.description: Receive a notification when someone sends you a message.
receive_notification_for_messages.recommended_action: Enable to stay up-to-date with your messages.

receive_notification_for_publishes_notes.description: Receive a notification when someone you follow publishes a note.
receive_notification_for_publishes_notes.recommended_action: Enable to stay updated on your network's activity.
